520.a: Three months passed since the VI Japan-Brazil Symposium on Science and Technology was held. Several late papers were handed in so that the fifth volume os the Proceedings is ready to be printed and presented to the participants. Opening Address by Profess or Takashi Mukaibo and the Congratulatory Massage at the Ceremony of the Eightieth Anniversary of Japanese Immi e gration to Brazil by Professor Jiro Kondo were included in this volume, as well as the proposal of the Japan - Brazil Program on Technology approved at the closing session. As Secretary of the Organizing Committee of Brazilian side I would like to express my gratitude to all individuals and public or private organization that contributed in some way for the success of the me e ting.
